content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[yourname], the answer is "No". We did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[yourname], there was no final agreement on the price. The last offer I made was 850 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[yourname], I am not satisfied with the outcome. On a scale from 1-10, I would rate my satisfaction as a 3.
name: Peter Schmidt
